trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Burbank
There were no other sightings in Burbank on or around May 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sittin' on m' lawn chair by the fire (I was on a camping trip). I was lookin' at the stars, talkin' to my brother. All o' the sudden, a light that was too bright to be a star just appeared outta nowhere. It blinked and flashed randomly. In perspective, it looked to be about the size of an aspirin. It looked as if the surface was blue and green and flashing red and orange lights, then it took off towards the North East. It kinda freaked me out, but m' brother's a skeptic, he thought it was just a plane, but I ain't to sure o' dat.
